languages.text: "Я надеюсь, всем очевидно, что в первую очередь надо спасать мои сокровища, трофеи и реликвии! А все остальное — во вторую!"
"I do hope it is obvious to everyone that my treasures, trophies, and relics are to be rescued first! Everything else comes second!"
languages.original_text: "Я надеюсь, всем очевидно, что в первую очередь надо спасать мои сокровища, трофеи и реликвии! А все остальное — во вторую!"

traits.locale_text: "I hope it's obvious to everyone that my treasures, trophies, and relics need to be rescued first! Everything else comes second!"
"I hope it's obvious to everyone that my treasures, trophies, and relics need to be rescued first! Everything else comes second!"
"I do hope it is obvious to everyone that my treasures, trophies, and relics are to be rescued first! Everything else comes second!"
"I do hope it is obvious to everyone that my treasures, trophies, and relics are to be rescued first! Everything else comes second!"
"I do hope it is obvious to everyone that my treasures, trophies, and relics are to be rescued first! Everything else comes second!"
"I do hope it is obvious to everyone that my treasures, trophies, and relics are to be rescued first! Everything else comes second!"

languages.text: «Espero que esté claro que mis tesoros, trofeos y reliquias son lo primero que hay que rescatar. ¡Todo lo demás es secundario!».
languages.original_text: "I do hope it is obvious to everyone that my treasures, trophies, and relics are to be rescued first! Everything else comes second!"

traits.locale_text: «Espero que esté claro que mis tesoros, trofeos y reliquias son lo primero que hay que rescatar. ¡Todo lo demás es secundario!».

languages.text: 「どう考えても、{mf|俺|私}の財宝に戦利品、遺物こそ、まず先に救出されるべきだな！他のことは二の次だ！」
languages.original_text: "I do hope it is obvious to everyone that my treasures, trophies, and relics are to be rescued first! Everything else comes second!"

traits.locale_text: 「どう考えても、{mf|俺|私}の財宝に戦利品、遺物こそ、まず先に救出されるべきだな！他のことは二の次だ！」

languages.text: “我希望所有人都能明白，我那些宝藏、战利品和圣物才是最重要的东西！其他的一切都是次要的！”
languages.original_text: "I do hope it is obvious to everyone that my treasures, trophies, and relics are to be rescued first! Everything else comes second!"

traits.locale_text: “我希望所有人都能明白，我那些宝藏、战利品和圣物才是最重要的东西！其他的一切都是次要的！”

languages.text: "Es ist hoffentlich für alle offensichtlich, dass meine Schätze, Trophäen und Relikte zuerst gerettet werden müssen! Alles andere ist zweitrangig!"
languages.original_text: "I do hope it is obvious to everyone that my treasures, trophies, and relics are to be rescued first! Everything else comes second!"

traits.locale_text: "Es ist hoffentlich für alle offensichtlich, dass meine Schätze, Trophäen und Relikte zuerst gerettet werden müssen! Alles andere ist zweitrangig!"

languages.text: « J'espère que tout le monde est bien conscient que mes trésors, mes trophées et mes reliques sont la priorité absolue ! Tout le reste n'a aucune importance ! »
languages.original_text: "I do hope it is obvious to everyone that my treasures, trophies, and relics are to be rescued first! Everything else comes second!"

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que tout le monde est bien conscient que mes trésors, mes trophées et mes reliques sont la priorité absolue ! Tout le reste n'a aucune importance ! »

languages.text: "Umarım herkes, ilk kurtarılması gerekenlerin hazinelerim, ganimetlerim ve yadigârlarım olduğu konusunda hemfikirdir! Bunlar dışındakiler ikincil öneme sahip!"
languages.original_text: "I do hope it is obvious to everyone that my treasures, trophies, and relics are to be rescued first! Everything else comes second!"
